nodes.text: K2-8 was a probe droid active in the aftermath of the war against Zakuul. In 3630 BBY it was brougth to Iokath, where it provided assistance during the the War on Iokath, a conflict between the threee major superpowers in the Galaxy: the Galactic Republic, the reconstituted Sith Empire, and the Eternal Alliance.
K2-8 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a vendor on Iokath for both Imperial and Republic players.
